snippet: The commander of basic training at Lackland Air Force Base in Texas was relieved of duty on Friday in connection with accusations that instructors at the base had sexually assaulted and harassed female recruits.
abstract: Col Glenn Palmer, the commander of basic training at Lackland Air Force Base in Texas, is relieved of duty in connection with accusations that instructors at the base had sexually assaulted and harassed female recruits.
lead_paragraph: The commander of basic training at Lackland Air Force Base in Texas was relieved of duty on Friday in connection with accusations that instructors at the base had sexually assaulted and harassed female recruits.

headline.main: Texas: Colonel Loses Post at Lackland Air Force Base
